title: Don't Hang Around, Get Active Font ID please
content:
Hi,

I need help identifying this title font. Any help would be much appreciated! Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IYPflyer1a.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018070313/http:/typophile.com/files/IYPflyer1a_0.jpg) | 27.27 KB |
author: Pabs69

comments.content:
GoodDogCool with extra marks removed.  
Ethan Dunham - Fonthead Design

[http://www.fonthead.com/fonts/GoodDog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018070313/http:/www.fonthead.com/fonts/GoodDog "http://www.fonthead.com/fonts/GoodDog")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018070313im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DontHang_6335.jpg)

GoodDog it is. Don't use the Cool variation though, just the regular one. [http://www.fonthead.com/fonts/GoodDog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018070313/http:/www.fonthead.com/fonts/GoodDog "http://www.fonthead.com/fonts/GoodDog")

Ethan

If you know a font is free, please first try to find a link on a credible site such as the actual foundries or on MyFonts. DaFont is approved as well. Some of the other sites have a mish-mash of truly free and pirated fonts that makes it impossible to control.

Nice to see you participating here Ethan. I have most of the Fonthead collections and show almost all the hand-drawn ones in my Script Guide.

- Mike Yanega
